films.title: Gone with the wind
films.quote: Frankly, my dear, I don't give a damn.

films.title: The Godfather
films.quote: I'm gonna make him an offer he can't refuse.

films.title: Dirty Harry
films.quote: You've got to ask yourself one question: 'Do I feel lucky?' Well, do ya, punk?

films.title: Jerry Maguire
films.quote: You had me at 'hello.'

films.title: The Wizard of Oz
films.quote: Toto, I've a feeling we're not in Kansas anymore.

films.title: Wall Street
films.quote: Greed, for lack of a better word, is good.

films.title: Taxi Driver
films.quote: You talking to me?

films.title: Scarface
films.quote: Say 'hello' to my little friend!

films.title: The Shining
films.quote: Here's Johnny!

films.title: Terminator 2:  Judgment Day
films.quote: Hasta la vista, baby.

films.title: A Few Good Men
films.quote: You can't handle the truth!

films.title: Rocky
films.quote: Yo, Adrian!

films.title: Jaws
films.quote: You're gonna need a bigger boat.

films.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
films.quote: My precious.

films.title: Forrest Gump
films.quote: My mama always said life was like a box of chocolates. You never know what you're gonna get.

films.title: The Sixth Sense
films.quote: I see dead people.

films.title: Top Gun
films.quote: I feel the need - the need for speed!

films.title: Dirty Dancing
films.quote: Nobody puts Baby in a corner.

films.title: Titanic
films.quote: I'm the king of the world!

films.title: Shrek
films.quote: Ogres are like onions.
